main event: An observer reported seeing a pulsating unidentified aerial object in Weirton, West Virginia on November 3, 1966.
interesting points: The object was larger than a star and flashed red, white, and blue colors.,The observer experienced feelings of unease and fear during the sighting.,The object was visible for about 10 to 15 minutes.,The observer described the object as something new and difficult to explain.,The incident occurred while the observer was returning from a mass war game location.
witness description: a very reliable person who felt uneasy and fearful during the incident
